application.summary: A clone and enhancement of Super Pang

description.p: Pang Zero is a clone and enhancement of Super Pang, a fast-paced action game that involves popping balloons with a harpoon.

The intention of our effort is to create a fun, open-source game that many (currently up to 6) people can play together. The game is playable, you can try it now. It's free, we made it because we like to share the fun. You can play Pang Zero alone, but it's a lot more fun to play with your friends.
